com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.billboard

Class Billboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.marketing.UpsightBillboard
      • com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.billboard.Billboard

  • public class Billboard
extends UpsightBillboard
    The internal model of a billboard eligible for receiving marketing content.

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public final UpsightBillboard setUp(UpsightContext upsight)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from class: UpsightBillboard
        Sets up the UpsightBillboard.
        Specified by:
        setUp in class UpsightBillboard
        Parameters:
        upsight - The com.upsight.android.UpsightContext.
        Returns:
        The registered UpsightBillboard.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - An active UpsightBillboard with the same scope already exists. A billboard remains active until either a content view is attached, or UpsightBillboard.destroy() is called.

      • destroy

        public final void destroy()
        Description copied from class: UpsightBillboard
        Destroys this UpsightBillboard by clearing all internal references, which makes it no longer eligible to receive marketing content. This ensures its UpsightBillboard.Handler.onAttach(String). will never be invoked after UpsightBillboard.destroy() returns.

        This call has no effect if a marketing content has already been attached via UpsightBillboard.Handler.onAttach(String). in which case you must wait until UpsightBillboard.Handler.onDetach() is called for the billboard to be cleared of internal references.

        Specified by:
        destroy in class UpsightBillboard
